metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1201 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NULL Pointer Dereference in mrb_vm_exec with super in GitHub repository mruby/mruby prior to 3.2. This vulnerability is capable of making the mruby interpreter crash, thus affecting the availability of the system.

criterions.comment: mruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
